main event: On 13 and 14 December 1957, fishermen observed an object believed to be a guided missile moving in a westerly direction, along with a large, bright object falling from the sky near Catalgazi-Kimii, Turkey.
interesting points: The sighting took place around 1930 hours on December 13 and 14,The object on December 13 was thought to be a guided missile heading toward Crimea,On December 14, a large bright object was seen falling from the sky,Approximately fifteen seconds later, a second unidentified object was observed moving at high speed and leaving a blue trace behind it,The characteristics indicated that the object might have been a meteor, according to conclusions drawn.
sighted object: unidentified objects including a possible guided missile and a bright falling object
